text: Aaradugula Bullet () is an upcoming Indian Telugu-language action film directed by B. Gopal. Produced by Thandra Ramesh under the banner of Jaya Balaji Real Media, the film stars Gopichand and Nayanthara, with music composed by Mani Sharma. The film's release was delayed indefinitely before the makers decided to release digitally in 2020. ==Cast== *Gopichand as Jayadev *Nayantara as Nandini *Prakash Raj as Nithyanand, Jayadev's father *Abhimanyu Singh as Shankar *Kota Srinivasa Rao as Shankar's father *Brahmanandam as Deefak Raj *Jaya Prakash Reddy as JP *Chalapathi Rao as Mohan Rao *Madhunandan as Kishore *Salim Baig *Feroz Abbasi *Uttej as Prabhu *Rama Prabha as Jayadev's grandmother *Surekha Vani *Jeeva *Sana *Sandhya Janak ==Soundtrack== Music composed by Mani Sharma. Lyrics were written by Sri Mani. Music released on Zee Music Company. ==Production== The film's production began in 2012 with Boopathy Pandian as a director under the title Jagan Mohan IPS however he left the film due to disagreements over the script. His replacement was B. Gopal who directed the film based on the story of Vakkantham Vamsi. ==Release== After receiving a U/A certificate from the Central Board of Film Certification, the film was scheduled to release theatrically on 9 June 2017. Financial troubles led to the film's shows getting cancelled on the aforementioned release date. In 2020, the makers decided to release the film digitally. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Films directed by B. Gopal Category:Masala films Category:Telugu film scores by Mani Sharma Category:Indian action films Category:Unreleased Telugu- language films Category:Indian films
title: Aaradugula Bullet
